thread.title: ‘This Is a Tantrum’: Greg Gutfeld Goes Off on Democrats’ Response to Trump Exec Order
thread.title_full: ‘This Is a Tantrum’: Greg Gutfeld Goes Off on Democrats’ Response to Trump Exec Order

author: Josh Feldman
title: ‘This Is a Tantrum’: Greg Gutfeld Goes Off on Democrats’ Response to Trump Exec Order
text:
‘This Is a Tantrum’: Greg Gutfeld Goes Off on Democrats’ Response to Trump Exec Order by Josh Feldman | 5:59   video 
Fox’s Greg Gutfeld tore into Democrats for throwing a “tantrum” over President Trump ‘s executive order and engaging in “hysteria” over facts. 
He showed video of the Democrats’ rally outside the Supreme Court yesterday, featuring a microphone that didn’t work and some singing, and called them “incompetent babies.” 
Gutfeld said there’s nothing wrong with a temporary moratorium to boost vetting in a time of terrorism, but that’s not how most of the press and the Democratic party sees it: 
“What we’re seeing is a tantrum by the media, by celebs, and by the bureaucrats who vote Democrat to protect their jobs. The opposition are babies who just got a flu shot. It’s for their protection, they know it, but they’re still crying.” 
You can watch the segment above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
